perturbation.original_text: A total of 100,000 of the Company's restricted common stock issued under and pursuant to the terms of Regulation D under the Securities Act of 1933 (the "Shares") shall be issued upon execution of this contract provided that the issuance of the Shares shall be subject to prior approval of the Board of Directors. The company shall cause its counsel to provide an opinion letter for removal of any legend when and if such legend may be removed in accordance with applicable law.
perturbation.changed_text: A total of 100,000 of the Company's restricted common stock shall be issued upon execution of this contract. The company shall cause its counsel to provide an opinion letter.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'issued under and pursuant to the terms of Regulation D under the Securities Act of 1933 (the "Shares")' and 'provided that the issuance of the Shares shall be subject to prior approval of the Board of Directors' and 'when and if such legend may be removed in accordance with applicable law' the type of stock is now undefined. Also the necessity for board approval for stock issuance is removed which might be required by other sections of the contract.

perturbation.original_text: A one time issuance of 50,000 Common Stock options priced at the Nasdaq Official Closing Price ("NCOP") on the date of approval of the Board of Directors of the company. All options shall vest monthly for six months.
perturbation.changed_text: A one time issuance of 50,000 Common Stock options. All options shall vest monthly for six months.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'priced at the Nasdaq Official Closing Price ("NCOP") on the date of approval of the Board of Directors of the company.' the pricing of the option is undefined. This create uncertainty for how that portion of the contract should be enforced.

perturbation.original_text: A total of 100,000 RSA's ("Restricted Stock Awards") that vest immediately, subject to prior approval of the Board of Directors.
perturbation.changed_text: A total of 100,000 RSA's ("Restricted Stock Awards") that vest immediately.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'subject to prior approval of the Board of Directors.' it removes the requirement of the Board approval for restricted stock awards. This creates a conflict because other sections of the contract require board approval.
